$timeunit=$time$unit $unit?=m{$unitstr=Minuten}{} $timeunit?=1m{$unitstr=Minute}{} $unit?=h{$unitstr=Stunden}{} $timeunit?=1h{$unitstr=Stunde}{} $unit?=d{$unitstr=Tage}{} $timeunit?=1d{$unitstr=Tag}{} $unit?=w{$unitstr=Wochen}{} $timeunit?=1w{$unitstr=Woche}{} $unit?=M{$unitstr=Monate}{} $timeunit?=1M{$unitstr=Monat}{} $encurl=%encode[url]
